data.name: ARRIVAL: ZERO EARTH Demo
data.detailed_description:
Aliens have invaded the earth and you have to assemble an army of local townspeople to fight them!

  • Set in Finland during the Winter in the '90s
  • Roguelike gameplay
  • Quick, about 20-minutes long sessions
  • Control one large army thru different procedurally generated levels
  • Collect items to gain new abilities
  • Different Unit types to build your army from
data.about_the_game:
Aliens have invaded the earth and you have to assemble an army of local townspeople to fight them!

  • Set in Finland during the Winter in the '90s
  • Roguelike gameplay
  • Quick, about 20-minutes long sessions
  • Control one large army thru different procedurally generated levels
  • Collect items to gain new abilities
  • Different Unit types to build your army from
data.short_description: Put on your Gore-Tex jacket, because it's winter in Finland. The year is 1995 and the aliens have invaded the earth! Roguelike action game with short, roughly 20 minute runs. Make the numbers go up by collecting items and by recruiting dozens of local townspeople to blast the enemy. Wishlist now!
